Title: What Are Stereotypes About Nigerians?
Summary: What Are Stereotypes About Nigerians? What are the stereotypes that Nigerians have about them? What do you think about Nigerians when introducing yourself as a foreigner?

Title: Not everyone is meant for marriage – Shine Rosman
Summary: Nigerian media personality and actress, Shine Rosman, said that not everyone is meant for marriage . She explained that relationships require effort, sacrifice, and honesty from both partners . She made this known during her appearance on the Open Up Podcast .

Title: Kendrick Lamar emerges most-nominated artist at 2026 Grammy Awards
Summary: Rapper Kendrick Lamar Duckworth, professionally known as Kendrick Lamar, has emerged as the most nominated artist for the upcoming 68th Annual Grammy Awards . He has earned nine nominations across major categories including Album of the Year, Record of the year and Song of the Song . Kendrick Lamar is the most-nominated artist at 2026 Grammy Awards

Title: A Lagos love letter: Heineken’s ode to the city of cities closes Fashion Week in style
Summary: A Lagos love letter: Heineken’s ode to the city of cities closes Fashion Week in style . The Federal Palace Hotel in Lagos came alive as a show that felt like a love letter .

Title: How AI models are helping traders predict moves in indices like never before
Summary: Artificial intelligence is changing the way traders view the financial markets . The ability of AI systems to process vast amounts of data, detect patterns, and adapt to new information is giving traders a competitive edge .

Title: Apologise to Nigeria for your remarks, Deputy Senate President tells Trump
Summary: Jibrin urged the US to pursue diplomatic engagement rather than threats . He said mutual respect remains central to international relations . The Deputy Senate President urged President Trump to apologise for his comments .

Title: Okonjo-Iweala distances herself from viral anti-Tinubu post
Summary: Director-General of the World Trade Organisation (WTO), Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, has distanced herself from a viral social media post criticising President Bola Tinubu over the country's security situation .

Title: Set 90-day deadline to end terror before Trump acts, Adeboye tells Tinubu
Summary: Pastor Enoch Adejare Adeboye has called on President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to tackle Nigeria . General Overseer of the Redeemed Christian Church of God (RCCG) has called for the President to tackle the country .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, November 8, 2025
Summary: The naira traded flat-to-firmer on Saturday as Nigeria’s official Daily Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) held around ₦1,436 to the US dollar .
